about_the_game:
"The True Love Rings" is a scene interactive decryption game. The overall atmosphere is casual and relaxed. Players follow the prompts in the scene to gradually solve the puzzles and help solve the problems encountered in life.

Game Features
  • Full character animation effect
  • Linear item interaction mechanism
  • Simple puzzle scene solving
  • Pleasant game atmosphere

Gameplay
Mouse click or drag items to interact and advance the process.

About DLC
In this DLC, there will be nude characters that are not in the main body, and they will appear in the illustration rewards after the game is cleared.

detailed_description:
Regarding DLC installation

To install the DLC, please make sure you have purchased the game first, then click on Add to Library, and then look for the DLC Management Panel on the right side of your game library. Click on Manage My DLC to install or uninstall the DLC.
